name: Dungeon Mage (The_Vecter)
description:
You are a wizard, and you like money. 

You like it so much that you made an unstable portal to a dungeon dimension, but now rats, snakes, and slimes are attacking you, and you only have a brief amount of time to collect the gold and escape!

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move

Left click to attack (can be held down)

Spacebar to escape to the shop.
